summary: Green Crypto Chimpzee Raises $890,000 From Global Investors – Next Big Thing?
title: Green Crypto Chimpzee Raises $890,000 From Global Investors – Next Big Thing?
content: The new crypto project Chimpzee has managed to secure significant interest from investors around the globe. As of today, it has successfully raised nearly $900,000 through a promising presale, exceeding initial expectations. The anticipation comes from a unique blend of incentivizing bonuses and an environmental ethos that permeates the heart of Chimpzee’s operations.
Chimpzee is a green crypto project, a fresh take on an evolving market. It uniquely embeds philanthropy into its structure, integrating token sales with conservation initiatives.¬†
They’ve already put this into action, planting 1000 trees in partnership with One Tree Planted upon reaching their $50,000 funding milestone.
Chimpzee went on to achieve further milestones.¬†
With these remarkable strides, the green crypto showing it’s more than mere rhetoric.

At its core, Chimpzee endeavors to weave financial opportunities and environmental conservation into a clever model. The project actively heightens public consciousness about deforestation and climate risks while financially supporting organizations that aid endangered species and counter deforestation.

Taking advantage of Web3 technology, Chimpzee introduces promising earning models, like the Chimpzee Shop (Shop2Earn), Chimpzee NFT Marketplace (Trade2Earn), and the Zero Tolerance Game (Play2Earn). With these engaging avenues and the enticements offered in presale, crypto investors have been quick to embrace Chimpzee.
As an ongoing project, Chimpzee has a clear path mapped out for the future. Phase 1 included the launch of the website, smart contract verification, and an aggressive pre-sale marketing campaign.

Moving forward, phases 2 through 7 encompass a range of objectives including the launch of CHMPZ Token, the development of the Chimpzee Store, the creation of ChimpzeeSwap, the development of a staking engine, NFT minting, donation tracking, and influencer marketing, to name just a few.
While Chimpzee is currently in its second presale stage, interest in its token continues to grow. Here’s a snapshot of the four presale stages:
The presale will conclude when all stages are complete, and Chimpzee will be listed at a price of $0.00185. After the presale ends, any unsold tokens will be burned.¬†

CHMPZ tokens can be acquired directly through the official Chimpzee website. After setting up a compatible wallet like MetaMask or Trust Wallet, potential buyers can select from three payment methods: Pay with a Credit Card, Buy with ETH, or Buy with USDT. Upon the presale’s conclusion, the purchased CHMPZ tokens can be claimed directly from the Chimpzee website.

Chimpzee offers additional incentives such as bonuses for early purchasers and opportunities to earn free CHMPZ tokens when buying Chimpzee merchandise. As the presale progresses and the popularity grows, these bonuses will diminish, but the potential impact of this green crypto project certainly shows no sign of waning.
